queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_extendedprice*lo_discount) as revenue from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and d_year = [YEAR-0] and lo_discount between ([DISCOUNT-0] - 1) and ([DISCOUNT-1] + 1) and lo_quantity < [QUANTITY-0];
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_extendedprice*lo_discount) as revenue from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and d_yearmonthnum = [YEARMONTHNUM-0] and lo_discount between ([DISCOUNT-0]-1) and ([DISCOUNT-1]+1) and lo_quantity between [QUANTITY-0] and [QUANTITY-1];
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_extendedprice*lo_discount) as revenue from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and d_weeknuminyear = [WEEKNUMINYEAR-0] and d_year = [YEAR-0] and lo_discount between ([DISCOUNT-0]-1) and ([DISCOUNT-1]+1) and lo_quantity between [QUANTITY-0] and [QUANTITY-1];
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_ where lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_revenue), d_year, p_brand1 from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and p_category = '[CATEGORY-0]' and s_region = '[REGION-0]' group by d_year, p_brand1 order by d_year, p_brand1;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey;

queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_revenue), d_year, p_brand1 from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and p_brand1 between '[BRAND-0]' and '[BRAND-1]' and s_region = '[REGION-0]' group by d_year, p_brand1 order by d_year, p_brand1;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey;

queries.sql_statement: select sum(lo_revenue), d_year, p_brand1 from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and p_brand1 = '[BRAND-0]' and s_region = '[REGION-0]' group by d_year, p_brand1 order by d_year, p_brand1;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from lineorder, date_, part, supplier where lo_orderdate = d_datekey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey;

queries.sql_statement: select c_nation, s_nation, d_year, sum(lo_revenue) as revenue from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_region = '[REGION1-0]' and s_region = '[REGION2-0]' and d_year >= [YEAR-0] and d_year <= [YEAR-1] group by c_nation, s_nation, d_year order by d_year asc, revenue desc;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select c_city, s_city, d_year, sum(lo_revenue) as revenue from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_nation = '[NATION1-0]' and s_nation = '[NATION2-0]' and d_year >= [YEAR-0] and d_year <= [YEAR-1] group by c_city, s_city, d_year order by d_year asc, revenue desc;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select c_city, s_city, d_year, sum(lo_revenue) as revenue from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_nation = '[NATION1-0]' and (c_city='[CITY1-0]' or c_city='[CITY1-1]') and (s_city='[CITY2-0]' or s_city='[CITY2-1]') and s_nation = '[NATION2-0]' and d_year >= [YEAR-0] and d_year <= [YEAR-1] group by c_city, s_city, d_year order by d_year asc, revenue desc;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select c_city, s_city, d_year, sum(lo_revenue) as revenue from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_nation = '[NATION1-0]' and (c_city='[CITY1-0]' or c_city='[CITY1-1]') and (s_city='[CITY2-0]' or s_city='[CITY2-1]') and s_nation = '[NATION2-0]' and d_yearmonth = '[YEARMONTH-0]' group by c_city, s_city, d_year order by d_year asc, revenue desc;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from customer, lineorder, supplier, date_ where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select d_year, c_nation, sum(lo_revenue-lo_supplycost) as profit1 from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_region = '[REGION1-0]' and s_region = '[REGION2-0]' and (p_mfgr = '[MFGR-0]' or p_mfgr = '[MFGR-1]') group by d_year, c_nation order by d_year, c_nation;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select d_year, s_nation, p_category, sum(lo_revenue-lo_supplycost) as profit1 from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_region = '[REGION1-0]' and s_region = '[REGION2-0]' and (d_year = [YEAR-0] or d_year = [YEAR-1]) and (p_mfgr = '[MFGR-0]' or p_mfgr = '[MFGR-1]') group by d_year, s_nation, p_category order by d_year, s_nation, p_category;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;

queries.sql_statement: select d_year, s_city, p_brand1, sum(lo_revenue-lo_supplycost) as profit1 from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey and c_region = '[REGION-0]' and s_nation = '[NATION-0]' and (d_year = [YEAR-0] or d_year = [YEAR-1]) and p_category = '[CATEGORY-0]' group by d_year, s_city, p_brand1 order by d_year, s_city, p_brand1;
queries.base-query: select [ATTRIBUTES] from date_, customer, supplier, part, lineorder where lo_custkey = c_custkey and lo_suppkey = s_suppkey and lo_partkey = p_partkey and lo_orderdate = d_datekey;
